name: jbaruch/speaker-toolkit
summary: Two-skill presentation system: analyze your speaking style into a rhetoric knowledge vault, then create new presentations that match your documented patterns.
description: A speaker-neutral toolkit with two async workflows connected by a shared vault. The rhetoric-knowledge-vault skill analyzes recorded talks to extract rhetoric patterns, humor techniques, slide design rules, and verbal signatures into a structured knowledge base. The presentation-creator skill reads that vault at runtime to help build new presentations that match the speaker's documented style.
